c74object.name: tap.random~
c74object.description: The tap.random~ object generates a random sample value, in the standard audio range [-1.0, 1.0] when it receives a zero to non-zero transition.

attribute.name: high_bound
attribute.description: Set the range for random numbers that are generated.

attribute.name: low_bound
attribute.description: Set the range for random numbers that are generated.
